description: This is a recently discovered video of a past photoshoot - with previously unseen behind-the-scenes footage! He does seem to be a bad influence of things and he continues, filling his mouth with each of the lads and then before you know it he gobbles both Cameron’s and Andrew’s uncut cocks at the same time! A great scene and Marc seems to be loving it. Lots of stuff happens in this shoot and Marc certainly is stepping out his shy boy beginning! Three straight lads in some fun action.
title: Video of Photo Shoot - Straight Lad Marc Learns to Suck Cock & Sucks Both Cameron & Andrew Together!
